description.value:
With a whispered prayer or arcane sending, you conjure Arcanotheign, herald of Nethys. She's a storm of magic, half white and half black, roiling in a vaguely humanoid shape. She occupies the space of a Medium creature and has a Speed of 40 feet and a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (sonic) Storm's Unbridled Destruction Arcanotheign arrives with a flash of light and a cacophonous crash of colliding magic. All enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] take @Damage[8d12[sonic]] damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 10 minutes.

Depart (electricity, healing) Flash of Brilliance Arcanotheign fires a powerful arcane blast at one target within 100 feet, dealing @Damage[5d12[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save, and a powerful divine blast at one ally, healing 5d12 Hit Points. Then, Arcanotheign asks for payment in the form of a fond memory. If you pay this cost, you lose this memory, Arcanotheign gains this memory, and Arcanotheign whispers a secret into your mind; you can immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] on any subject at mythic proficiency.

duration.value: until the end of your next turn
